Document.Focus: Urinary catheters - what to ask your doctor

Synonyms.Synonym: What to ask your doctor about urinary catheters

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Urinary catheters - what to ask your doctor
QAPair.Answer: You have an indwelling catheter (tube) in your bladder. This means the tube is inside your body. This catheter drains urine from your bladder into a bag outside your body. Below are some questions you may want to ask your health care provider to help you take care of your catheter.
